Name: example-goal
Description: An example custom goal demonstrating all available features
Usage: Use this as a template for creating your own custom goals
PromptInstructions:
This is an example goal. You can customize these instructions to guide the AI assistant in helping you accomplish your specific task.

You have access to:
- Context management (add, list, edit, remove, show)
- Custom state (customOption, counter)
- Custom commands (increment, reset)

Modify this goal file to create your own workflow!

PromptOptions.exampleOption: You can add arbitrary data here for use in templates

BannerText: Example Custom Goal - Demonstrating OSM Goal Features
HelpText:
Available commands:
  add <file>      Add files to context
  note <text>     Add a note
  list            List context items
  edit <index>    Edit a context item
  remove <index>  Remove a context item
  show            Show the current prompt
  copy            Copy prompt to clipboard
  increment       Increment the counter
  reset           Reset custom state
  help            Show this help
  exit            Exit the goal
